news.title: 炸锅！特朗普视频惹众怒
特朗普分享种族主义视频后删除，引发两党谴责
news.title0: Trump removes video with racist clip depicting Obamas as apes
news.content: 美国总统特朗普在社交媒体分享了一段将奥巴马夫妇描绘成猿猴的种族主义视频，引发两党强烈批评后，该视频已被删除。
news.content0: US President Donald Trump has removed a social media video which included a racist clip depicting Barack and Michelle Obama as apes.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 挪威王储妃为与爱泼斯坦的友谊公开致歉
news.title0: Norway's crown princess apologises after pressure over Epstein friendship
news.content: 挪威王储妃梅特-玛丽特就她与已故性犯罪者爱泼斯坦长达三年的邮件往来，向挪威人民发表“深刻道歉”。
news.content0: Norway's Crown Princess Mette-Marit has given a "profound apology" to Norwegians for her friendship with late sex offender Jeffrey Epstein, after it emerged they had exchanged messages for three years.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 中国酒店偷拍产业：情侣私密视频被直播给数千人
news.title0: We had sex in a Chinese hotel, then found we had been broadcast to thousands
news.content: 一对情侣在深圳酒店入住后，发现其私密时刻被隐藏摄像头偷拍，视频被上传至社交平台供数千人付费观看。
news.content0: One night in 2023, Eric was scrolling on a social media channel he regularly browsed for porn. Seconds into a video, he froze.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 说唱歌手Lil Jon之子失踪数日后被推定死亡
news.title0: Son of rapper Lil Jon believed dead, days after going missing
news.content: 美国说唱歌手Lil Jon的儿子在佐治亚州家中失踪数日后，警方在附近池塘发现一具遗体，初步认定是其本人。
news.content0: The son of rapper Lil Jon is believed to have been found dead, days after he went missing from his home in the US state of Georgia, authorities said.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 乌克兰士兵“死而复生”，被俘三年后与家人通话
news.title0: Ukrainian mother's joy after phone call with son she thought had been killed
news.content: 一名被认定阵亡并已安葬的乌克兰士兵，在俄乌战俘交换中被释放，与以为他已牺牲的母亲通上电话。
news.content0: Nazar Daletskyi's family were sure the soldier had been killed in action.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 姐妹被困苏格兰古堡60英尺高墙，惊险求生
news.title0: The sisters who got stuck in a Scottish castle
news.content: 两名姐妹在苏格兰邓斯塔夫纳奇城堡游览时被困在约60英尺高的城墙顶部，一度面临险境。
news.content0: Niki Ghofranian surveyed the view from atop the stone walls of Dunstaffnage Castle, hoping, against the odds, to find a way out.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 罕见2000年前木乃伊肖像画拍出近89万美元
news.content: 一幅来自罗马埃及时期、描绘一位眼神深邃男子的罕见木乃伊肖像画，在苏富比拍卖行以88.9万美元成交，远超估价。
news.content0: A funerary portrait from Roman Egypt, featuring a strikingly modern-looking male subject with piercing hazel eyes and graying hair, sold for more than double its high estimate on Thursday during Sotheby’sMasters Weeksales in New York.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国东西部天气“冰火两重天”格局即将改变
news.title0: The eastern US has been gripped by an Arctic freeze. That’s about to change
news.content: 美国东部严寒、西部温暖的极端天气格局已持续数周，预计将在本周末迎来一次重大转变。
news.content0: The US is a nation divided, with frigid conditions, snow and ice entrenched east of the Rockies all the way into Florida, and record warmth and paltry snowfall in the West.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 日本首相高市早苗豪赌闪电选举，人气能否转化为选票？
news.title0: Japan’s conservative leader bets big on Takaichi mania with snap election. Will her gamble pay off?
news.content: 日本首相高市早苗上任仅三个月便宣布解散众议院举行大选，并承诺若自民党未获多数席位将辞职，政治豪赌引发关注。
news.content0: In scenes normally reserved for J-pop stars, thousands of fans huddle against the cold outside a small train station on the outskirts of Tokyo, their phones held high for a glimpse of Japan’s latest obsession.
news.author: CNN
